required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment of Breast Cancer With Trastuzumab + HS627/ Pertuzumab + Docetaxel
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase III Study to Compare HS627 vs. Pertuzumab on the Efficacy, Safety and Immunogenicity in Combination With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel as Neoadjuvant Therapy in Patients With Early-stage or Locally Advanced HER2 Positive Breast Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhe Jiang Hisun Bioray Bio-pharmaceu tical Co.Ltd

clinical_study.source: Zhe Jiang Hisun Bioray Bio-pharmaceu tical Co.Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: The trial included screening period (4 weeks) and treatment period (4 treatment cycles, at least 12 weeks).

detailed_description.textblock: A multicenter, randomized, double-blind, positive drug parallel control design was used. The trial included screening period (4 weeks) and treatment period (4 treatment cycles, at least 12 weeks). All eligible subjects were randomly divided into experimental group (hs627 treatment group) and control group (pertuzumab) treatment group. After 4 treatment cycles, the subjects arranged surgical treatment, and then conducted the last visit.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants achieving Pathological Complete Response (pCR) as Assessed by the Independent Review Committee (IRC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: After surgery (At surgery cycle 4 Days 22-35)(1 cycle = 21 days)
primary_outcome.description: pCR was defined as ypT0/is According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer Staging System as Assessed by the IRC

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Total Pathologic Complete Response (tpCR) as Assessed by the Independent Review Committee (IRC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After surgery (At surgery cycle 4 Days 22-35) (1 cycle = 21 days)
secondary_outcome.description: tpCR was defined as ypT0/is, ypN0 as assessed by an Independent Review Committee (IRC)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With pCR as Assessed by the Local Pathologist
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After surgery (At surgery cycle 4 Days 22-35) (1 cycle = 21 days)
secondary_outcome.description: pCR was defined as ypT0/is as assessed by Local Pathologist

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Total Pathologic Complete Response (tpCR) as Assessed by the Local Pathologist
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After surgery (At surgery cycle 4 Days 22-35) (1 cycle = 21 days)
secondary_outcome.description: tpCR was defined as ypT0/is, ypN0 as assessed by Local Pathologist

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With an Objective Response
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to surgery (Cycle 4 Days 21) (1 cycle = 21 days)
secondary_outcome.description: An objective response was defined as the percentage of participants who achieved a complete response or partial response as the best tumor response during the treatment period (that is, during Cycles 1-4 prior to surgery), as determined by the investigator on the basis of Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with vital signs, physical examination, left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF), laboratory examination, adverse events (AE) until last visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Last Visit （After surgery 8 days）（After 4 cycles treatment ，After surgery ） (1 cycle = 21 days)
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of participants who experienced at least one vital sign, physical examination, left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF), laboratory examination, adverse events (AE) during the study is reported here.

intervention.description: Prior to surgery: trastuzumab, HS627, and docetaxel for 4 cycles (1 cycle = 21 days).
Prior to surgery: trastuzumab, Pertuzumab, and docetaxel for 4 cycles (1 cycle = 21 days).

overall_official.affiliation: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

facility.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
